variable.name: Diabetes Mellitus
variable.description: Diabetes status, documented physician diagnosis of diabetes mellitus treated with oral hypoglycemic drug or insulin.

variable.name: Heart Disease
variable.description: Heart disease status including coronary heart disease, ischemic heart disease, cardiovascular disease, pulmonary heart disease, hereditary heart disease, hypertensive heart disease, inflammatory hear

variable.name: Hypertension
variable.description: Hypertension status defined according to the Joint National Committee VI criteria as systolic blood pressure of 140 mm Hg or greater or taking antihypertensive medication.

variable.name: Smoking Status
variable.value: Former smoker (any cigarette greater than 30 days before enrollment)
